title: Number of Messages Counter
content:
I used to be able to see the number/count of new messages and old messages in all of my message folders. There seems to have been an update, and all of my numbers are missing. Can you tell me how to fix this please.

Regards, Jan Knight
creator: jan231

title: Opening emails in Local Folders on my C drive using Explorer in Windows 11
content: How do I open emails in Local Folders using Explorer in Windows 11? I know they should be in C:\users\[user]\AppData\Roaming\Thunderbird\Profiles. Btw, the AppData folder only showed after I told Explorer to show Hidden files; any help should note this. I found that folder with 2 subfolders; 1 was iup3xrv2.default-release which seemed to have the only relevant content - Mail\2023 and \2023.msf. Those appear to be the Local Folder (2023) I set up to receive my archived emails. But when I tried to open them, an email opened with an attachment that Thunderbird could not open. I would like to be able to access the archived emails through Explorer so I can mass delete, search, rename, see file size etc. Please explain and help. Thanks.
creator: davidob1996

title: migration
content: I have migrated sackvilleandlane@westnet.com.au from Westnet to The Messaging Company, they tell me it is successful, but I cannot get emails. They now tell me it is my provider. Can you please fix it for me? With thanks Heather
creator: sackvilleandlane

title: How do I open emails I stored in Local Folders on my C drive using Explorer in Windows 11?
content: This adds to the question I asked earlier today. I would also like to copy my emails archived on my old laptop to my new laptop by moving them to a thumb drive or Passport and from there to my new laptop. How can I? Again, thanks for your help.
creator: davidob1996

title: Why can't I mark multiple folders in Thunderbird
content: Why can't I mark multiple folders in Thunderbird, you could before updating to version 115.4.2 (32-bit). It is a good idea when, for example, exporting emails in EML format Best regards Kenneth Winther
creator: mkwinther

title: Message Window Too Small
content:
Since the big update I cannot read my messages in the message window without scrolling as I read each line. The message window is so small that I can only see about four lines of text at a time. I can't get the messages to open in a new window unless I click on them and choose "open in new window" even after setting them to open in a new window on their own.

The last update fixed the font on everything from being too big in spite of settings so now I can read a little more at a time. It's still very frustrating having to scroll constantly.
creator: susiesmith13

title: Thunderbird app on MacBook Air.

title: How to print address list????
content: I've been using Thunderbird/Eudora for 20+ years. Today, I was forced to download a new version today. In doing so, I lost most of my saved folders as well as my email address list. Just finished reentering 200+ addresses but can't figure out how to print a hard copy so I can crosscheck and save as a hard copy. HELP!!!!!.
creator: matrhassen

title: Problem with attachments after updating Thunderbird from version 102.15.1 to version 115.4.2
content:
Hello, After updating the Thunderbird email program from version 102.15.1 to version 115.4.2, each new email received with a (checked) .pdf, .docx downloaded to disk 0 Bytes and displaying an empty document. Create it directly in Thunderbird, it's also impossible. In the case of this message to another sender who has Thunderbird 102.15.1, it opens without any problems, forward it to the recipient who has access to the 115.4.2 version, it already opens ten files and saves it to disk in a size that has ten files. Strange thing, it works, but it can't be like that. Please let me know what could be the solution to the problem.

Regards
creator: tzajdel1

title: Jak vrátit vzhled TB před poslední aktualizací?
content: Po aktualizaci na verzi 115.4.1 se po létech změnilo rozložení ovládání TB k horšímu. Pole rychlého filtru se přesunulo na horší místo, tlačítka rychlých filtrů apod. změnila vzhled. Namísto původního přehledného vybarvení tlačítka se na každém objevila jakási "svítící diodka" tak malá a nevýrazná, že její použití není na první pohled patrné. Celkově je nový skin plošší jak je dnes hloupým zvykem, ale to dovedu přežít. Jak vrátit původní rozložení a vzhled tlačítek rychlých filtrů? Hodně je používám.
creator: Ja.Claudius

title: Html bulk mail with thunderbird
content:

Thanks.

title: Mail con allegato scompaiono
content: Alcune mail, con allegato, una volta ricevute (visualizzo notifica in basso a dx sul monitor) dopo qualche secondo scompaiono dall'elenco della Posta in arrivo. Alcune riesco a recuperarle tempo dopo cliccando sulla notifica che compare sullo smartphone (sincronizzato) ed è come se venisse cambiata la data di ricezione. Non modifica il numero di "mail non lette"
creator: panzera.nicola
